segments.text: Watching this scene, the kitchen feels lived-in and familiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are ajar, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands tall on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies while balancing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her turn, arm up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret adventure is adorable but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman dries dishes by the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs freely, no one stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle expands, soaking the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's small panes show a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, everything calm out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the stool could tip, causing a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
